subject: Baseball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Nationals outfielder was suspended and fined an undisclosed amount for three incidents during the past week, including his role on a brawl with the Marlins on Wednesday.
snippet: The Nationals outfielder was suspended and fined an undisclosed amount for three incidents during the past week, including his role on a brawl with the Marlins on Wednesday.
